title: System Engineer (Network Engineer)
description:
**System Engineer (Network Engineer)** 




  





 We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced Network Engineer to manage,
 



 operate, and support our enterprise network infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have
 



 deep hands\\-on experience in firewalls, switching, wireless technologies, and
 



 network security, with strong expertise in troubleshooting, configuration, and
 



 operations.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




 ‚óè Design, configure, implement, and support enterprise network infrastructure
 



 including firewalls, switches, wireless, and cloud security platforms.
 



 ‚óè Manage and troubleshoot Palo Alto Firewalls (mandatory) ‚Äî policies, NAT,
 



 VPNs, security profiles, upgrades, and HA.
 



 ‚óè Configure and support Cisco Nexus switches (mandatory) ‚Äî VLANs, VPC,
 



 routing, OS upgrades, and troubleshooting.
 



 ‚óè Manage Cisco Meraki switches and access points (mandatory), including
 



 dashboard administration, monitoring, wireless optimization, fine\\-tuning, and
 



 architecture understanding.
 



 ‚óè Support Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA) and ZTNA solutions, including policy
 



 configuration and user troubleshooting.
 



 ‚óè Monitor network performance using standard network monitoring tools,
 



 proactively identifying and troubleshooting issues.
 



 ‚óè Handle incidents, service requests, and changes through a ticketing system,
 



 ensuring adherence to SLAs and ITIL processes.
 



 ‚óè Perform root cause analysis (RCA) for network issues and implement
 



 preventive actions.
 



 ‚óè Work closely with internal teams, vendors, and service providers for issue
 



 resolution and continuous improvement.
 



 ‚óè Participate in network upgrades, migrations, and new technology
 



 implementations.
 



 ‚óè Maintain network documentation, SOPs, and diagrams.
 



  





**Mandatory Skills \\& Qualifications** 




 ‚óè Strong hands\\-on experience with
 **Palo Alto Firewalls (mandatory).** 




 ‚óè Extensive experience with
 **Cisco Nexus switches** 
**(mandatory).** 




 ‚óè Hands\\-on experience with Cisco Meraki switches and wireless access points
 



 (
 **mandatory).** 




 ‚óè Experience with Zscaler (ZIA) and ZTNA security solutions.
 



 ‚óè Solid understanding of network monitoring tools (mandatory).
 



 ‚óè Experience working with
 **IT ticketing systems** 
 and operational processes
 



**(mandatory).** 




 ‚óè Deep technical expertise in Firewalls, Switching, and Wireless technologies,
 



 including configuration and advanced troubleshooting.
 



 ‚óè Strong understanding of TCP/IP, LAN/WAN, routing, switching, and network
 



 security concepts.
 



 Good to Have
 



 ‚óè Knowledge of
 **Zscaler Digital Experience (ZDX).** 




 ‚óè Exposure to cloud networking (AWS / Azure / GCP).
 



 ‚óè Relevant certifications such as CCNP, PCNSE, Meraki, Security certifications,
 



 etc.
 



  





**Behavioral \\& Soft Skills** 




 ‚óè Excellent troubleshooting and analytical skills.
 



 ‚óè Strong communication and documentation skills.
 



 ‚óè Ability to work independently in a fast\\-paced environment.
 



 ‚óè Strong ownership mindset with customer\\-centric and operational focus.
 



 ‚óè Strong documentation creation ability.
 



  





**Work Requirements** 




 ‚óè 5 days work from office (no remote/hybrid).
 



 ‚óè Availability for critical issue support, maintenance windows, and on\\-call
 



 support as required
 



**Location \\- Bangalore**

title: Junior MERN Stack Engineer
description:
**Job Description** 




  





 We are looking for a Junior MERN Stack Engineer who is eager to learn and grow in a fast\\-paced startup environment. You will work closely with senior engineers to build and maintain web applications while gaining hands\\-on experience across the full stack.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




  




* Assist in developing web applications using the MERN stack
* Write clean and maintainable front\\-end and backend code
* Build and consume REST APIs
* Fix bugs and improve existing features
* Participate in code reviews and team discussions
* Learn best practices in system design, security, and scalability

* intermediate knowledge of JavaScript (ES6\\+)
* Familiarity with React.js, Node.js, and Express.js
* Basic understanding of MongoDB or databases
* Understanding of REST APIs
* Knowledge of Git and version control
* Willingness to learn and adapt in a startup environment

title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ6\\-9 LPA
 



 Experience: 0 ‚Äì 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours ‚Äî eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We‚Äôre a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You‚Äôll work on real problems ‚Äî from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines ‚Äî while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You‚Äôll Need:
 



 \\-0‚Äì3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.
 



 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 \\-Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.
 



 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.
 



 \\-Join a fast\\-paced, product\\-first environment where you can see your impact directly.
 



 \\-Competitive pay, flexibility, and the opportunity to grow with the company.
 



 \\-Collaborate with passionate builders and problem\\-solvers who are transforming hiring.
 



  





 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to meet you.

title: Full-Stack Development Intern
description:
**Full\\-Stack Development Intern** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Stipend:** 
 Up to ‚Çπ7,500 (Performance\\-Based)
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is committed to nurturing future\\-ready software developers through live projects, hands\\-on learning, and structured mentorship programs. The organization focuses on building strong front\\-end and back\\-end development capabilities aligned with real\\-world industry standards and modern web technologies.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Full\\-Stack Development Intern, you will gain end\\-to\\-end exposure to modern web application development. This role involves working across the complete development stack‚Äîfrom designing intuitive user interfaces to developing secure and scalable backend systems‚Äîmaking it ideal for candidates aspiring to become full\\-stack developers.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop, and deploy full\\-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB/MySQL
* Build and integrate RESTful APIs to ensure seamless communication between front\\-end and back\\-end systems
* Optimize applications for performance, security, and scalability
* Debug, test, and maintain codebases and repositories
* Collaborate with team members in an agile development environment
* Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvement



**Eligibility \\& Requirements** 



* Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js
* Working knowledge of databases such as MongoDB and MySQL
* Familiarity with REST APIs and version control tools like Git/GitHub
* Strong logical thinking and problem\\-solving abilities
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team\\-oriented environment



**What You Will Gain** 



* Performance\\-based stipend of up to ‚Çπ7,500
* Certificate of Internship upon successful completion
* End\\-to\\-end exposure to real\\-world software development projects
* Mentorship and technical guidance from industry professionals
* Opportunity to build and strengthen a full\\-stack development portfolio
* Potential full\\-time employment opportunity based on performance

title: Java Software Engineer
description:
Greetings from TCS!!!
 



 Come and join us for an exciting career with TCS!!!
 



  





 TCS has always been in the spotlight for being adept in ‚Äúthe next big technologies‚Äù. What we can offer you is a space to explore varied technologies and quench your techie soul.
 



  





 We are arranging a Virtual interview Drive at below mentioned details, please proceed with this job posting.
 



  





 Required Technical Skill Set \\-
 **Java Developer (Spring Boot, GenAI, Angular13\\)** 




  





 Location \\-
 **Kolkata, Bhubaneswar, Indore** 




 Experience Range :
 **4\\-8 Years** 




  





**Role Overview** 




 We are looking for a future ready Java Developer with strong expertise in Spring Boot, Angular 13, and foundational knowledge of GenAI technologies. This role is ideal for developers who want to work at the intersection of traditional full stack development and next generation AI driven capabilities.
 



 You will build backend services, integrate GenAI components, and create responsive UI experiences while contributing to innovative product features.
 



 Key Responsibilities
 


* Develop backend modules using Spring Boot with clean, maintainable coding practices.
* Integrate GenAI components (LLM\\-based APIs, embeddings, model inference) into product workflows.
* Create responsive and modular UI features using Angular 13\\.
* Design and implement scalable APIs with strong security and performance considerations.
* Collaborate with AI/ML teams to consume model outputs and enable intelligent application features.
* Troubleshoot platform issues and enhance system reliability.
* Participate in agile ceremonies, design discussions, and peer code reviews.



**Required Technical Skills** 



* Strong hands\\-on experience in Java, Spring Boot, microservices.
* Practical experience with Angular 13, TypeScript, HTML/CSS.
* Exposure to GenAI/LLM APIs, prompt engineering concepts, and basic AI integration patterns.
* Good understanding of REST API design, caching, and distributed systems.
* Familiarity with cloud services used for AI deployment (Azure OpenAI, AWS Bedrock, etc.).



**Nice to Have** 



* Experience with vector databases (Pinecone, Redis Vector, etc.).
* Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines.
* Awareness of MLOps or model lifecycle concepts.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we‚Äôll give you what you need to make it happen. It won‚Äôt always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you‚Äôll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 R\\&D Team Lead
   

  

  

  

  

  

**Your Role And Responsibilities**
 In this role, you will have the opportunity to contribute significantly to successful project results in technology, software, product, and/or solution development, as well as associated Intellectual Proper\\-ty (IP). Each day, you will act as the first point of contact in Research and Development for specific product\\-related issues and maintenance. You will also showcase your expertise by identifying, proposing, and implementing innovative solutions.
   

  

 In this role, you‚Äôll help run what runs the world, by taking on meaningful work that drives real impact.
   

  

 The work model for the role is:
   

  

 This role is contributing to the Electrification business in Smart Power at Bangalore, India.
   

  

**You will be mainly accountable for**
* Required active participation/contribution in team discussions.
* Provide technical solutions to in solving business problems.
* Collaborate with the team to understand business needs and requirements.
* Write clean and efficient code to ensure the quality and performance of the software.
* Perform unit testing and debugging of applications. Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers.


**Our Team Dynamics**
 Our teams support each other, collaborate, and never stop learning. Everyone brings something unique, and together we push ideas forward to solve real problems. Being part of our team means your work matters \\- because the progress we make here creates real impact out there.
   

  

  

**Qualifications For The Role**
* You are immersed in R\\&D function for software development
* You have 7 to 12 years of experience in design, build and configure applications to meet business pro\\-cess and application requirements using Angular, Spring Boot, RESTful API development, Micro services and SQL
* Possess an enhanced knowledge of Angular, Spring Boot
* Degree in Computer Science (should be full\\-time)
* You are at ease communicating in English


**More About Us**
 ABB Smart Power is a global technology leader, with products and solutions that make power supplies smart, connected and protected. Its intelligent products and solutions make power more competitive by improving the energy efficiency, productivity and reliability of almost any operation.
   

  

 \\#ABBCareers \\#RunwithABB \\#Runwhatrunstheworld
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Company Description** 




  





 Kuchoriya TechSoft is a prominent software development company in Spain with over 15 years of experience in the industry. We specialize in providing cutting\\-edge solutions in mobile and web application development, utilizing advanced technologies like AI, IoT, and cloud computing to enable business transformation. Our services include Custom Software Development, Mobile App Development, Game Development including AR/VR, and Salesforce Development. With an ISO 9001:2015 certification, our commitment to exceptional quality and customer satisfaction is unwavering. Our diverse team of innovative professionals is driven by the goal of delivering reliable solutions tailored to our clients' needs.
 



  




**Position: Senior Full\\-Stack Engineer (Backend\\-Focused)** 

  





**Experience:** 
 7‚Äì14 Years
 



**Location:** 
 Jaipur (Open to Remote)
 



**Work Mode:** 
 Full\\-time \\| 9:00 AM ‚Äì 6:00 PM UK Time
 



**Start Date:** 
 ASAP (Immediate joiners highly preferred)

 We strongly encourage female engineers to apply as part of our diversity hiring initiative but Male can also apply

 Mac is mandatory for remote candidates.
 



  




**Location Restrictions** 

 Candidates must not be from Russia or Belarus, including relocated individuals. Proof of nationality will be required for shortlisted candidates. No sensitive personal data should be shared during the application process.
 



  




 üöÄ
 **Why This Role is Exciting** 

 This is not just another engineering role ‚Äî it‚Äôs an opportunity to
 **build high\\-impact, scalable products used by global customers** 
 while working with modern cloud\\-native technologies.
 



 You will be part of a fast\\-moving, innovation\\-driven team where your ideas influence architecture, engineering standards, and product direction. We value engineers who think like owners, challenge the status quo, and enjoy solving complex technical problems.
 



  





 If you thrive in environments that reward
 **technical excellence, autonomy, and continuous learning** 
 , this role is for you.
 



  




**Role Overview** 

 We are seeking a
 **Senior Full\\-Stack Engineer with deep backend expertise** 
 to architect and deliver resilient, high\\-performance applications. You will play a critical role in shaping system design, improving engineering practices, and mentoring team members while collaborating with product and design teams to deliver exceptional user experiences.
 



  




 ‚≠ê

* Architect and build
 **cloud\\-native, event\\-driven systems** 
 using Node.js and AWS.
* Design scalable microservices and serverless applications with reliability and performance at the core.
* Own features end\\-to\\-end ‚Äî from technical design to deployment and optimization.
* Develop intuitive, high\\-performing user interfaces with
 **React, Next.js, Redux, and Material UI** 
 .
* Implement secure and efficient APIs using
 **GraphQL** 
 .
* Drive Infrastructure as Code using
 **Terraform** 
 and enhance deployment pipelines through
 **GitHub Actions** 
 .
* Optimize data storage strategies across
 **MongoDB and DynamoDB** 
 .
* Champion engineering best practices including testing, code reviews, observability, and documentation.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to translate ambitious product goals into technical reality.
* Mentor junior engineers and contribute to a strong engineering culture.
* Continuously evaluate new technologies to keep our stack modern and competitive.



  




 üß†
 **We‚Äôre Looking for Engineers Who** 
* Think in terms of
 **systems, scalability, and long\\-term architecture**
* Take ownership and deliver with minimal oversight
* Are passionate about clean, maintainable code
* Communicate clearly and collaborate effectively
* Are proactive problem\\-solvers who enjoy tackling complex challenges



  




**Core Technical Expertise** 

  




**Backend** 
* Node.js
* AWS (SNS, SQS, Lambda, EventBridge)
* Event\\-driven / microservices architecture
* Serverless frameworks
* MongoDB \\& DynamoDB
* Terraform


**Frontend** 
* React
* Redux
* Next.js
* Material UI



  




**Additional Strengths** 
* GraphQL
* Jest or similar testing frameworks
* CI/CD (GitHub Actions preferred)



  




**Basic Qualifications** 
* 7‚Äì14 years of professional software development experience
* Proven success in building
 **scalable, production\\-grade applications**
* Strong understanding of modern engineering principles and design patterns
* Experience working in Agile environments
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field (or equivalent experience)
* Excellent Communication
* Note: Ned only those profiles who has expertise in these mention technologies



  




 üåü
 **What Sets You Apart** 
* Experience with high\\-growth startups or product\\-based companies
* Strong architectural decision\\-making skills
* Passion for performance optimization and reliability
* Experience mentoring or leading engineers
* Contributions to open\\-source projects or technical communities



  





 Follow our page for more updates: https://www.linkedin.com/company/kuchoriyatechsoft/?viewAsMember\\=true and share profiles at HR@kuchoriyatechsoft.com

title: Senior Python Software Engineer
description:

* Design and implement solutions to support key business needs.

title: Sr SDE, COMS Tech
description:
**Description**
 Trustworthy Shopping Experience team focuses on improving seller experiences and ensuring a safe, trusted marketplace for our customers. We work on various aspects of e\\-commerce, product safety, quality and compliance, catalog management and order remediation. We are seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer to join our team in building a global compliance product. The ideal candidate will be passionate about helping customers, skilled at bringing clarity to ambiguous situations through data\\-driven experimentation. You will work with an international team of product managers and stakeholders, tackling complex software architecture design challenges and building highly scalable services.
   

  

 We offer exposure to global markets and diverse technical challenges, opportunities to work on full\\-stack development, platform engineering, and performance optimization, encourages creative problem\\-solving, data\\-driven decision\\-making and continuous learning. If you thrive in a dynamic, innovative environment and want to make a significant impact on e\\-commerce technology, we encourage you to apply. Join us in shaping the future of e\\-commerce technology and delivering trustworthy shopping experiences to millions of customers worldwide.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design, develop, and launch innovative products and services.
* Create scalable, fault\\-tolerant distributed systems for storage, indexing, and querying.
* Implement predictive solutions on distributed systems using state\\-of\\-the\\-art technologies.
* Design and code effective solutions for broadly defined problems.
* Work in an agile environment to deliver high\\-quality software.


**About The Team**
**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
* Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent
* 9\\+ years of non\\-internship professional software development experience
* 9\\+ years of programming with at least one software programming language experience
* 5\\+ years of leading design or architecture (design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and existing systems experience
* Experience as a mentor, tech lead or leading an engineering team


**Preferred Qualifications**
* 7\\+ years of full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations experience

**Title**
 Data Engineer
   

  

**Job Description**
 A Data Engineer is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining large\\-scale data systems and infrastructure. Their primary goal is to ensure that data is properly collected, stored, processed, and retrieved to support business intelligence, analytics, and data\\-driven decision\\-making.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and Develop Data Pipelines: Create data pipelines to extract data from various sources, transform it into a standardized format, and load it into a centralized data repository.
* Build and Maintain Data Infrastructure: Design, implement, and manage data warehouses, data lakes, and other data storage solutions.
* Ensure Data Quality and Integrity: Develop data validation, cleansing, and normalization processes to ensure data accuracy and consistency.
* Collaborate with Data Analysts and Business Process Owners: Work with data analysts and business process owners to understand their data requirements and provide data support for their projects.
* Optimize Data Systems for Performance: Continuously monitor and optimize data systems for performance, scalability, and reliability.
* Develop and Maintain Data Governance Policies: Create and enforce data governance policies to ensure data security, compliance, and regulatory requirements.


**Experience \\& Skills**
* Hands\\-on experience in implementing, supporting, and administering modern cloud\\-based data solutions (Google BigQuery, AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, Snowflake, etc.).
* Strong programming skills in SQL, Java, and Python.
* Experience in configuring and managing data pipelines using Apache Airflow, Informatica, Talend, SAP BODS or API\\-based extraction.
* Expertise in real\\-time data processing frameworks.
* Strong understanding of Git and CI/CD for automated deployment and version control.
* Experience with Infrastructure\\-as\\-Code tools like Terraform for cloud resource management.
* Good stakeholder management skills to collaborate effectively across teams.
* Solid understanding of SAP ERP data and processes to integrate enterprise data sources.
* Exposure to data visualization and front\\-end tools (Tableau, Looker, etc.).
* Strong command of English with excellent communication skills.

title: Silicon Verification Engineer
description:
**Silicon Verification Engineer** 




**Multiple roles across different levels** 




 Graphcore is a globally recognised leader in Artificial Intelligence computing systems. The company designs advanced semiconductors and data centre hardware that provide the specialised processing power needed to drive AI innovation, while delivering the efficiency required to support its broader adoption.
 



  





 As part of the SoftBank Group, Graphcore is a member of an elite family of companies responsible for some of the world‚Äôs most transformative technologies. We are opening a new AI Engineering Campus in Bengaluru which will play a central role in Graphcore's work building the future of AI computing.
 



  





 The verification team sits within the Silicon design team and is responsible for ensuring that the RTL created by the logical design team and used by the physical design team matches the architecture specification for Graphcore silicon. The silicon verification engineer is responsible for verification activities within Graphcore, helping the team meet the company objectives for quality silicon delivery.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Verification planning, specification and closure of functional coverage
* Providing feedback to architects
* Test generation and failure diagnosis/triage
* Contributing to shared verification infrastructure
* Ensuring good communication between sites



  





**Essential Skills** 



* Verification experience in the relevant industry
* Proven leadership and planning skills
* Highly motivated, a self\\-starter, and a team player
* Ability to work across teams and programming languages to find root causes of deep and complex issues
* Experience of the verification process applied in CPU and/or ASIC environments
* **System Verilog, Basic of Python (Must have)** 
 , C\\+\\+, Linux



  





**Desirable Skills** 



* UVM
* SVA
* Assembly languages
* LLVM, GCC
* DVCS e.g. Git
* SGE or other DRMS
* XML and XPath/XSLT
* Web programming ‚Äì HTML/DOM, JavaScript, SQL



  





**Benefits** 




 In addition to a competitive salary, Graphcore offers a competitive benefits package. We welcome people of different backgrounds and experiences; we‚Äôre committed to building an inclusive work environment that makes Graphcore a great home for everyone. We offer an equal opportunity process and understand that there are visible and invisible differences in all of us. We can provide a flexible approach to interview and encourage you to chat to us if you require any reasonable adjustments.
